bootcamps.name: Moringa School
bootcamps.description: Moringa School is a world-class coding school with a mission to empower a generation of tech innovators and disruptors in Africa. Our immersive programs focus on teaching in-demand skills that prepare students for employment in high-growth tech industries.

bootcamps.name: iLab Africa
bootcamps.description: iLab Africa is a research and innovation centre that provides a conducive environment for students and entrepreneurs to learn, research, and develop innovative solutions to the challenges facing African societies.

bootcamps.name: Tech Academy
bootcamps.description: Tech Academy is a leading coding school in Kenya that offers industry-relevant tech training to help students launch successful careers in tech. Our hands-on programs are designed to give students the skills and confidence they need to succeed in the digital economy.
